about_the_game:
Autumn Book

This Autumn themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Experience the cold but beautiful scenery that Autumn brings from the comfort of your home!

Crunch leaves, watch the wildlife and keep yourself cosy and warm!

Contents

The Autumn book unlocks the following images:
  • Autumn Leaf - 32x35
  • Pinecone - 32x45
  • Acorn - 39x43
  • Forest Floor - 58x107
  • Conkers - 65x47
  • Fox - 68x79
  • Bonfire - 85x79
  • Cold Nights - 89x110
  • Picnic - 97x76
  • Campfire - 104x61
  • Storms - 105x140
  • Pond - 120x120
  • Squirrel - 121x95
  • Autumn Winds - 126x133
  • Autumn Wreath - 136x138
  • Forest Animal Band - 160x59
  • Mushrooms - 160x135
  • Combine Harvester - 180x94
  • A Bed of Leaves - 188x175
  • Sunset - 200x240

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: Coloring Pixels - Autumn Pack

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
